name: The Lord of the Rings Onlineâ„¢
description: Standalone lotro client with DXVK and Esync enabled
notes:
Getting directx11 working in Lord of the Rings Online
https://www.reddit.com/r/SteamPlay/comments/9umhk2/getting_directx11_working_in_lord_of_the_rings/

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/StandingStoneGames/The Lord of the Rings Online/LotroLauncher.exe

content:
files:
- lotro_installer: http://content.turbine.com/sites/clientdl/lotro/lotrolive.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/StandingStoneGames/The Lord of the Rings Online/LotroLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2017
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    description: Setting Windows version to Windows 10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: --mode unattended
    executable: lotro_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE: 1
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: ge-protonified-4.9-x86_64
